Plasma_Spray.display_help: The IDF soldier can concentrate a large amount of plasma and release it in a staggering blast of energy capable of both knocking down foes and dealing moderate damage.
Plasma_Spray.display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown
Plasma_Spray.display_target_help: The IDF soldier can concentrate a large amount of plasma and release it in a staggering blast of energy capable of both knocking down foes and dealing moderate damage.
Plasma_Spray.display_target_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown

Plasma_Burst.display_help: The IDF soldier's gauntlets are capable of firing potent plasma energy attacks at their foes which strike with enough force to sometimes knock a foe off their feet.
